column5: Does anyone know if Lac Hebert is in a ZEC or if Tamarac has sole fishing rights ? In other words - if I was to find my own way up to Lac Hebert - could I fish it legally ?? Thanks Todd.
It's my understanding they have exclusive rights to this lake.

No,Air Tamarac has exclusive rights with the indians,and has had them for the last ten yrs.It would cost you more than the flyin to get your things in there. It will not be a drive to lake any time soon thank God! Its one of Quebecs top walleye producing lakes,because its regulated and controlls the number of people on it
Book a trip with them,and you will see why
Thanks guys - I have a camp on mattawa bay and thought it would be cool to fly over for a day Of better fishing
